article:
{{Multiple issues|


}}

'Virus Locker' is a program that claims to be antispyware software but is in
reality malware. [http://www.spyware-removal-guideline.com/viruslocker-
removal Spyware removal guidelines] It is linked to by other malware and
tries to get the user to buy its suspicious software for about $50.

Virus Locker is a rouge-anti Virus Software that trys to trick users into
thinking it is a legit program. The program may send you fake alerts, that
should be ignored. It try's to scam users into purchasing the software. This can
unauthorized purchases being made on one's credit card.

How to Remove Virus Locker: [http://www.symantec.com/security_response/writeup.jsp?docid=2007-
070317-1911-99]

1. Restart your computer and press the F8 key until you are in safemode (an
   option to enter safemodde will show up)

2. Press the start key and enter "Uninstall" in the search. Then click on
   uninstall programs.

3. Find a program that is VirusLocker 3.1 and click on it

4. Finally click on "Remove", this will remove the program.

5. It is recommended to also scan your computer with an Anti-Virus software that
   is up to date.

ADVANCE STEPS (Note: don't try to change the Registry if you don't have much
experience modifying registries. Changing the wrong thing
can cause computer to crash)

Delete the following from the Registry..

*HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\CLSID\{979D896F-B47E-5D13-0D66-
3DC25B122BF9} *HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\Interface\{22B6E0AA-348B-4247-9325-
302F41502629} *HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\Interface\{31C748B4-6DCE-463A-98F6-
E6C6BD33118D} *HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Classes\Interface\{3AC3CC91-DAC7-4E25-B5A7-
